00019 #ifndef DG_DATATYPES_H
00020 #define DG_DATATYPES_H
00021 
00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 #include <limits.h>
00024 #include <float.h>
00025 #include <math.h>
00026 
00027 //******************************************************************************
00028 
00029 namespace dg
00030 {
00031 
00032 // #############################################################################
00033 // DataTypes - Basic platform independent Datatypes
00034 // #############################################################################
00035 
00036 typedef bool                    Bool;   // 1 bit (maybe...)
00037 typedef char                    Char;   // 8 bit
00038 typedef unsigned char   UChar;  // 8 bit
00039 typedef signed short    Short;  // 16 bit
00040 typedef unsigned short  UShort; // 16 bit
00041 typedef signed int      Int;    // 32 bit
00042 typedef unsigned int    UInt;   // 32 bit
00043 typedef signed long     Long;   // 32 bit
00044 typedef unsigned long   ULong;  // 32 bit
00045 typedef float                   Float;  // 32 bit
00046 typedef double                  Double; // 64 bit
00047 //typedef long double           LongDouble;     // 128 bit
00048 
00049 typedef signed char     Int8;   // 8 bit
00050 typedef signed short    Int16;  // 16 bit
00051 typedef signed long     Int32;  // 32 bit
00052 typedef unsigned char   UInt8;  // 8 bit
00053 typedef unsigned short  UInt16; // 16 bit
00054 typedef unsigned long   UInt32; // 32 bit
00055 
00056 typedef float                   Real32; // 32 bit
00057 typedef double                  Real64; // 64 bit
00058 typedef float                   Real;   // default real
00059 //******************************************************************************
00060 #ifdef WIN32
00061 #define isnan _isnan
00062 #define isinf(f) (!_finite((f)))
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 #ifdef __APPLE_
00066 extern "C" {
00067   int isinf(double);
00068   int isnan(double);
00069 }
00070 #endif // __APPLE__
00071 //******************************************************************************
00072 inline bool IsNaN(Real fV)
00073 {
00074         return isnan(fV);
00075 }
00076 //******************************************************************************
00077 inline bool IsInf(Real fV)
00078 {
00079         return isinf(fV);
00080 }
00081 //******************************************************************************
00082 inline Real Validate(Real fV)
00083 {
00084         if(IsInf(fV) || IsNaN(fV))
00085                 return 0;
00086         else
00087                 return fV;      
00088 }
00089 //******************************************************************************
00090 
00091 } // end namespace: dg
00092 
00093 //******************************************************************************
00094 
00095 #endif  // end file: DataTypes.h
